lead_paragraph: Mercedes denied on Wednesday that Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton trashed his room in a fit of anger after a qualifying crash and lied about the state of his relationship with German team mate Nico Rosberg.

headline.print_headline: Lauda 'Sets Record Straight' on Hamilton Comments
headline.main: Lauda 'Sets Record Straight' on Hamilton Comments

snippet: Mercedes denied on Wednesday that Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton trashed his room in a fit of anger after a qualifying crash and lied about the state of his relationship with German team mate Nico Rosberg....
